title: 383 - 3 Steps for Creating the Work that Gets You The Work You're Perfect For
description:
Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk

Support the show at patreon.com/creativepeptalk!

Transcripts available at creativepeptalk.com/episodes!

_________

SHOW NOTES

Human Rhythm Series: Part Five

Win Back Your Creative Confidence || part of The Inner Critic Series - Skillshare Class with Lucy Lambriex

_________

CALL TO ADVENTURE

Make a Passion Pit jet!
What project or piece could you make specifically for someone/something as if it were a gift?

_________

SPONSORS

ASTROPAD DARKBOARD
Darkboard is a new ultra-light ergonomic drawing surface for iPad. It’s developed by the creators of Astropad Studio, long-time friends of the podcast.

They created Darkboard to fix some of the most common pain points of artists — like hand cramps, bad posture, and being stuck at your desk. The Kickstarter to fund the creation of the Darkboard is LIVE NOW!! The first backers get the best rewards - so go check it out at darkboard.com.

SKILLSHARE
There’s nothing better than getting better. Accomplishing growth is extremely satisfying, and online classes from Skillshare make it possible. Learn about illustration, design, photography, productivity, and marketing. With Skillshare’s short classes, you can move your creative journey forward without putting life on hold. So explore your creativity at Skillshare.com/CreativePep where our listeners get a free trial of Premium Membership.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 383 - 3 Steps for Creating the Work that Gets You The Work You're Perfect For
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
This episode is for you if:
1 - You feel pressure to go viral with your work or appeal to everyone.
2 - If you’re unhappy with where you are in your practice and need a big breakthrough fast.
3 - Need a creative prompt that will help you create work that helps you get the opportunities you’re perfect for.
itunes:subtitle:

1 - You feel pressure to go viral with your work or appeal to everyone.
2 - If you’re unhappy with where you are in your practice and need a big breakthrough fast.
3 - Need a creative prompt that will help you create work that helps you get the opportunities you’re perfect for.
itunes:keywords: creative pep talk, creative prompt, creativity, creative practice, creative process, andy j pizza, career, creative, prompt, motivation, art, human rhythms, gift
